added.description: Control optimizations for aggressive boxing elimination
added.name: AggressiveUnboxing

added.description: Assert Range Check Elimination
added.name: AssertRangeCheckElimination

added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK10
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13
added.description: Instruct the VM to assume multiple processors are available
added.name: AssumeMP

added.description: Patch invokedynamic appendix not known at compile time
added.name: C1PatchInvokeDynamic

added.description: id of compilation to trigger assert in compiler thread for the purpose of testing, e.g. generation of replay data
added.name: CICrashAt

added.description: Interval in milliseconds that CMS thread checks if it should start a collection cycle
added.name: CMSCheckInterval

added.description: Commence a CMS collection cycle (at least) every so many milliseconds (0 permanently, -1 disabled)
added.name: CMSTriggerInterval

added.description: Do unloading of classes with a concurrent marking cycle
added.name: ClassUnloadingWithConcurrentMark

added.description: Minimum code cache size (in bytes) required to start VM.
added.name: CodeCacheMinimumUseSpace

added.description: Maximum size of class area in Metaspace when compressed class pointers are used
added.name: CompressedClassSpaceSize

added.description: How many bytes to pad the fields/classes marked @Contended with
added.name: ContendedPaddingWidth

added.description: JVM aborts, producing an error log and core/mini dump, on the first occurrence of an out-of-memory error
added.name: CrashOnOutOfMemoryError

added.description: Disable the use of stack guard pages if the JVM is loaded on the primordial process thread
added.name: DisablePrimordialThreadGuardPages

added.description: Dump the names all loaded classes, that could be stored into the CDS archive, in the specified file
added.name: DumpLoadedClassList

added.description: Record replay data for crashing compiler threads
added.name: DumpReplayDataOnError

added.description: Enable @Contended annotation support
added.name: EnableContended

added.description: JVM exits on the first occurrence of an out-of-memory error
added.name: ExitOnOutOfMemoryError

added.description: Extra classlist for building the CDS archive file
added.name: ExtraSharedClassListFile

added.description: Optimize loads from stable fields (marked w/ @Stable)
added.name: FoldStableValues

added.description: Try to reclaim dead large objects at every young GC.
added.name: G1EagerReclaimHumongousObjects

added.description: Try to reclaim dead large objects that have a few stale references at every young GC.
added.name: G1EagerReclaimHumongousObjectsWithStaleRefs

added.description: Print some information about large object liveness at every young GC.
added.name: G1TraceEagerReclaimHumongousObjects

added.description: Verifies the consistency of the marking bitmaps
added.name: G1VerifyBitmaps

added.description: Number of times to retry allocations when blocked by the GC locker
added.name: GCLockerRetryAllocationCount

added.description: Delay in scheduling GC workers (in milliseconds)
added.name: GCWorkerDelayMillis

added.description: Ignore empty path elements in -classpath
added.name: IgnoreEmptyClassPaths

added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK10
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13
added.description: Do not quit -Xshare:dump even if we encounter unverifiable classes. Just exclude them from the shared dictionary.
added.name: IgnoreUnverifiableClassesDuringDump

added.description: Increase the compile threshold for C1 compilation if the code cache is filled by the specified percentage
added.name: IncreaseFirstTierCompileThresholdAt

added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK15
Obsoleted in JDK16
Expired in JDK17
added.description: Initial size of the boot class loader data metaspace
added.name: InitialBootClassLoaderMetaspaceSize

added.description: File containing inlining replay information[default: ./inline_pid%p.log] (%p replaced with pid)
added.name: InlineDataFile

added.description: If non-zero, maximum number of words that malloc/realloc can allocate (for testing only)
added.name: MallocMaxTestWords

added.description: Maximum allowable local JNI handle capacity to EnsureLocalCapacity() and PushLocalFrame(), where <= 0 is unlimited, default: 65536
added.name: MaxJNILocalCapacity

added.description: The maximum expansion of Metaspace without full GC (in bytes)
added.name: MaxMetaspaceExpansion

added.description: The maximum percentage of Metaspace free after GC to avoid shrinking
added.name: MaxMetaspaceFreeRatio

added.description: Maximum size of Metaspaces (in bytes)
added.name: MaxMetaspaceSize

added.description: Fail metadata allocations at intervals controlled by MetadataAllocationFailALotInterval
added.name: MetadataAllocationFailALot

added.description: Metadata allocation failure a lot interval
added.name: MetadataAllocationFailALotInterval

added.description: Initial size of Metaspaces (in bytes)
added.name: MetaspaceSize

added.description: The minimum expansion of Metaspace (in bytes)
added.name: MinMetaspaceExpansion

added.description: The minimum percentage of Metaspace free after GC to avoid expansion
added.name: MinMetaspaceFreeRatio

added.description: Removes cold nmethods from code cache if > 0. Higher values result in more aggressive sweeping
added.name: NmethodSweepActivity

added.description: Limit on speculative traps (of one kind) in a method (includes inlines)
added.name: PerMethodSpecTrapLimit

added.description: Use the FP register for holding the frame pointer and not as a general purpose register.
added.name: PreserveFramePointer

added.description: Print the number of CPUs detected in os::active_processor_count
added.name: PrintActiveCpus

added.description: Print the code cache memory usage each time a method is compiled
added.name: PrintCodeCacheOnCompilation

added.description: Print field layout for each class
added.name: PrintFieldLayout

added.description: Print an identifier for each garbage collection
added.name: PrintGCID

added.description: print statistics about method flushing
added.name: PrintMethodFlushingStatistics

added.description: Print per-lock-site statistics of rtm locking in JVM
added.name: PrintPreciseRTMLockingStatistics

added.description: Print shared archive file contents
added.name: PrintSharedArchiveAndExit

added.description: If PrintSharedArchiveAndExit is true, also print the shared dictionary
added.name: PrintSharedDictionary

added.description: Print string deduplication statistics
added.name: PrintStringDeduplicationStatistics

added.description: Lock abort ratio at which to stop use RTM lock eliding
added.name: RTMAbortRatio

added.description: Calculate abort ratio after this number of aborts
added.name: RTMAbortThreshold

added.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before start calculating aborts for RTM locking
added.name: RTMLockingCalculationDelay

added.description: Lock count at which to do RTM lock eliding without abort ratio calculation
added.name: RTMLockingThreshold

added.description: Number of RTM retries on lock abort or busy
added.name: RTMRetryCount

added.description: Spin count for lock to become free before RTM retry
added.name: RTMSpinLoopCount

added.description: Increment total RTM attempted lock count once every n times
added.name: RTMTotalCountIncrRate

added.description: Renumber live nodes
added.name: RenumberLiveNodes

added.description: Enable replay of compilations from ReplayDataFile
added.name: ReplayCompiles

added.description: File containing compilation replay information[default: ./replay_pid%p.log] (%p replaced with pid)
added.name: ReplayDataFile

added.description: Ignore exceptions thrown during initialization for replay
added.name: ReplayIgnoreInitErrors

added.description:
Control handling of class initialization during replay:
0 - don't do anything special;
1 - treat all class initializers as empty;
2 - treat class initializers for application classes as empty;
3 - allow all class initializers to run during bootstrap but pretend they are empty after starting replay
added.name: ReplaySuppressInitializers

added.description: Restrict @Contended to trusted classes
added.name: RestrictContended

added.description: Override the default location of the CDS archive file
added.name: SharedArchiveFile

added.description: Address to allocate shared memory region for class data
added.name: SharedBaseAddress

added.description: Override the default CDS class list
added.name: SharedClassListFile

added.description: The optimization level passed to LLVM, possible values: None, Less, Default and Agressive
added.name: SharkOptimizationLevel

added.description: Runs LLVM verify over LLVM IR
added.name: SharkVerifyFunction

added.description: Extra method data trap entries for speculation
added.name: SpecTrapLimitExtraEntries

added.description: special version of ISO_8859_1$Encoder.encodeISOArray
added.name: SpecialEncodeISOArray

added.description: Randomize instruction scheduling in GCM
added.name: StressGCM

added.description: Randomize instruction scheduling in LCM
added.name: StressLCM

added.description: stress loop invariant code motion
added.name: StressLoopInvariantCodeMotion

added.name: StressRangeCheckElimination

added.description: Stress linktime bytecode rewriting
added.name: StressRewriter

added.description: A string must reach this age (or be promoted to an old region) to be considered for deduplication
added.name: StringDeduplicationAgeThreshold

added.description: Force table rehash every time the table is scanned
added.name: StringDeduplicationRehashALot

added.description: Force table resize every time the table is scanned
added.name: StringDeduplicationResizeALot

added.description: Default survivor space alignment in bytes
added.name: SurvivorAlignmentInBytes

added.name: TraceClassLoaderData

Obsoleted in JDK16

added.description: Trace processing of class paths
added.name: TraceClassPaths

added.description: Trace the default method processing steps

added.description: Trace chunk metadata allocations
added.name: TraceMetadataChunkAllocation

added.description: Trace humongous metadata allocations
added.name: TraceMetadataHumongousAllocation

added.description: Trace virtual space metadata allocations
added.name: TraceMetavirtualspaceAllocation

added.description: Trace expanding nodes after register allocation.
added.name: TracePostallocExpand

added.description: trace runtime traps caused by predicate failure
added.name: TracePredicateFailedTraps

added.description: Trace Range Check Elimination
added.name: TraceRangeCheckElimination

added.description: max number of call arguments to consider for type profiling
added.name: TypeProfileArgsLimit

added.description: =XYZ, with Z: Type profiling of arguments at call; Y: Type profiling of return value at call; X: Type profiling of parameters to methods; X, Y and Z in 0=off ; 1=jsr292 only; 2=all methods
added.name: TypeProfileLevel

added.description: max number of incoming parameters to consider for type profiling, -1 for all
added.name: TypeProfileParmsLimit

added.description: Use BMI1 instructions
added.name: UseBMI1Instructions

added.description: Use BMI2 instructions
added.name: UseBMI2Instructions

added.description: Control whether CLMUL instructions can be used on x86/x64
added.name: UseCLMUL

added.description: use intrinsics for java.util.zip.CRC32
added.name: UseCRC32Intrinsics

added.description: Use 32-bit class pointers in 64-bit VM. lp64_product means flag is always constant in 32 bit VM
added.name: UseCompressedClassPointers

added.description: Use count trailing zeros instruction
added.name: UseCountTrailingZerosInstruction

added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14
added.description: Mark well-known stable fields as such (e.g. String.value)
added.name: UseImplicitStableValues

added.description: Carry inline depth of profile point with speculative type and give priority to profiling from lower inline depth
added.name: UseInlineDepthForSpeculativeTypes

added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK15
Obsoleted in JDK16
Expired in JDK17
added.description: Use large page memory in metaspace. Only used if UseLargePages is enabled.
added.name: UseLargePagesInMetaspace

added.description: Simple loop invariant code motion for short loops during GVN
added.name: UseLoopInvariantCodeMotion

added.description: Enables intrinsification of various java.lang.Math functions
added.name: UseMathExactIntrinsics

added.description: Enables intrinsification of BigInteger.montgomeryMultiply()
added.name: UseMontgomeryMultiplyIntrinsic

added.description: Enables intrinsification of BigInteger.montgomerySquare()
added.name: UseMontgomerySquareIntrinsic

added.description: Enables intrinsification of BigInteger.mulAdd()
added.name: UseMulAddIntrinsic

added.description: Enables intrinsification of BigInteger.multiplyToLen()
added.name: UseMultiplyToLenIntrinsic

added.description: Perform deopt and recompilation based on RTM abort ratio
added.name: UseRTMDeopt

added.description: Enable RTM lock eliding for stack locks in compiled code
added.name: UseRTMForStackLocks

added.description: Enable RTM lock eliding for inflated locks in compiled code
added.name: UseRTMLocking

added.description: Use RTM Xend instead of Xabort when lock busy
added.name: UseRTMXendForLockBusy

added.description: Control whether SHA instructions can be used on SPARC
added.name: UseSHA

added.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-1 crypto hash function
added.name: UseSHA1Intrinsics

added.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-224 and SHA-256 crypto hash functions
added.name: UseSHA256Intrinsics

added.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-384 and SHA-512 crypto hash functions
added.name: UseSHA512Intrinsics

added.description: Enables intrinsification of BigInteger.squareToLen()
added.name: UseSquareToLenIntrinsic

added.description: Use string deduplication
added.name: UseStringDeduplication

added.description: Speculatively propagate types from profiles
added.name: UseTypeSpeculation

added.description: Abort VM on erroneous or inconsistent generic signatures
added.name: VerifyGenericSignatures

added.description: Verify shared spaces (false for default archive, true for archive specified by -XX:SharedArchiveFile)
added.name: VerifySharedSpaces

added.description: verify StringTable contents at exit
added.name: VerifyStringTableAtExit

added.defaultValue: Memory sub-systems to verify when Verify*GC flag(s) are enabled. One or more sub-systems can be specified in a comma separated string. Sub-systems are: threads, heap, symbol_table, string_table, codecache, dictionary, classloader_data_graph, metaspace, jni_handles, c-heap, codecache_oops
added.name: VerifySubSet

removed.description: Weight for perm gen exponential resizing, between 0 and 100
removed.name: AdaptivePermSizeWeight

removed.description: (Unsafe,Unstable) Diagnostic - Controls emission of atomics
removed.name: Atomics

removed.description: Automatically shutdown native memory tracking under stress situation. When set to false, native memory tracking tries to stay alive at the expense of JVM performance
removed.name: AutoShutdownNMT

removed.description: Percentage CMS perm generation occupancy to start a CMScollection cycle. A negative value means that CMSTriggerPermRatio is used
removed.name: CMSInitiatingPermOccupancyFraction

removed.description: Whether concurrent precleaning enabled in perm gen (effective only when CMSPrecleaningEnabled is true)
removed.name: CMSPermGenPrecleaningEnabled

removed.description: Size of CMS KlassKlass revisit stack
removed.name: CMSRevisitStackSize

removed.description: Percentage of MinHeapFreeRatio in the CMS perm generation that is allocated before a CMS collection cycle commences, that also collects the perm generation
removed.name: CMSTriggerPermRatio

removed.description: When less than X space left, start code cache cleaning
removed.name: CodeCacheFlushingMinimumFreeSpace

removed.description: If true, use deferred RS updates
removed.name: G1DeferredRSUpdate

removed.description: If the young survival rate is S, and there's room left in to-space, we will allow regions whose survival rate is up to S + (1 - S)*X, where X is this parameter (as a fraction.)
removed.name: G1ExtraRegionSurvRate

removed.description: Expected Survival Rate for newly allocated bytes
removed.name: G1InitYoungSurvRatio

removed.description: When true, print applications of closures to external locs.
removed.name: G1PrintOopAppls

removed.description: If true, generate null-pointer filtering code in RS barrier
removed.name: G1RSBarrierNullFilter

removed.description: If true, print a histogram of RS occupancies after each pause
removed.name: G1RSCountHisto

removed.description: Enables the parallelization of remembered set scanning during evacuation pauses
removed.name: G1UseParallelRSetScanning

removed.description: Enables the parallelization of remembered set updating during evacuation pauses
removed.name: G1UseParallelRSetUpdating

removed.description: Initialize various error and exception classes - turn off for individual method debugging
removed.name: InitializeJavaLangExceptionsErrors

removed.description: Initialize java.lang.String - turn off for individual method debugging
removed.name: InitializeJavaLangString

removed.description: Initialize java.lang.System - turn off for individual method debugging
removed.name: InitializeJavaLangSystem

removed.description: controls whether Classes and interned Strings are allocatedin perm. This purely intended to allow debugging issuesin production.
removed.name: JavaObjectsInPerm

removed.description: Max expansion of permanent heap without full GC (in bytes)
removed.name: MaxPermHeapExpansion

removed.description: Maximum size of permanent generation (in bytes)
removed.name: MaxPermSize

removed.description: Min number of seconds between code cache cleaning sessions
removed.name: MinCodeCacheFlushingInterval

removed.description: Min expansion of permanent heap (in bytes)
removed.name: MinPermHeapExpansion

removed.description: How much buffer to keep for perm gen sizing
removed.name: PermGenPadding

removed.description: Percentage (0-100) of the perm gen allowed as dead wood.See MarkSweepDeadRatio for collector-specific comments.
removed.name: PermMarkSweepDeadRatio

removed.description: Initial size of permanent generation (in bytes)
removed.name: PermSize

removed.description: Print how many words were saved with CompactFields
removed.name: PrintCompactFieldsSavings

removed.description: Print revisit (klass and MDO) stack related information
removed.name: PrintRevisitStats

removed.description: Enable GC-to-GC recording and querying of compaction during MarkSweep
removed.name: RecordMarkSweepCompaction

removed.description: Size of dummy block used to shift heap addresses (in bytes)
removed.name: SharedDummyBlockSize

removed.description: At dump time, order shared objects to achieve better cold startup time.
removed.name: SharedOptimizeColdStart

removed.description:
Reordering policy for SharedOptimizeColdStart
0=favor classload-time locality, 1=balanced,
2=favor runtime locality
removed.name: SharedOptimizeColdStartPolicy

removed.description: Skip assert() and verify() which page-in unwanted shared objects.

removed.description: Mark nmethods non-entrant at registration
removed.name: StressNonEntrant

removed.description: Trace late expand of nodes.
removed.name: TraceLateExpand

removed.description: Use Intimate Shared Memory (Solaris Only)
removed.name: UseISM

removed.description: Use Multiple Page Size Support (Solaris 9 Only)
removed.name: UseMPSS

removed.description: Use lwsync instruction if true, else use slower sync
removed.name: UsePPCLWSYNC

removed.description: Obsolete flag for compatibility (same as UseISM)
removed.name: UsePermISM

removed.description: use split verifier with StackMapTable attributes
removed.name: UseSplitVerifier

removed.description: Enable String cache capabilities on String.java
removed.name: UseStringCache

removed.description: Number of times to spin wait on a v8 atomic operation lock
